resources.string: See how many problems you can go without stumbling?
Remember: No Calculator, No Work, Just Your Brain!
See how fast you can get through these ten problems
Do not forget Log Day! Give your brain a good workout with these practice problems

I created this app because I feel people do not do mental math as much as they should. In a world with calculators and computers, people do not see the need for number crunching in their heads. However, mental math helps improve memory and overall brain function. So I hope you will drop your calculators and give your brains a good math workout!
All glory and honor goes to God, and special thanks to my friends and family, my mentor Qi Wang, and of course my ISM teacher Mrs. Clarac.
